name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This course covers the basics of Journalism, including the history, ethics, and fundamentals of reporting.

name: Political Science Basics
description: This course covers the basics of Political Science, including the history, politics, and fundamentals of government.

name: Political Reporting
description: This course covers the basics of Political Reporting, including the basics of news writing and reporting, and the fundamentals of covering politics.

name: Advanced Political Reporting
description: This course covers the advanced topics of Political Reporting, including advanced news writing and reporting, and the fundamentals of investigative reporting.
